name: x402-zk-circuits
description: Circom circuits for x402 payment proofs

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/payment_proof.r1cs pot12_final.ptau build/payment_proof_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute build/payment_proof_0000.zkey build/payment_proof_final.zkey --name='First contribution' -v
scripts.export: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/payment_proof_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.export-solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/payment_proof_final.zkey build/verifier.sol
scripts.powers-of-tau: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name='First contribution' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.build-all: npm run compile && npm run powers-of-tau && npm run setup && npm run contribute && npm run export && npm run export-rust
